ygData.subject: Re: What's missing in Everquest?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... let me refresh your memory a little, the original letter here was written with, shall we say not the best spelling. this comment was then added ... said,
ygData.messageBody:
>Mike please refrain from personal attacks on people, everyone is entitled to
>their opinion. This is how ideas are exchanged.

>Thanks for your understanding.

>Ves
let me refresh your memory a little, the original letter here was written
with, shall we say not the best spelling.
this comment was then added

>If English is your 2nd language, then I aplologize for this post. That
said,
>GOOD LORD MAN get a dictionary!!!!! Your spelling is so bad I can't even
>read your post.
>
>Wizaro

Now this is totally wrong. and mike posts this.

>Bah. Get a life. I have no problems with that and I'm from Sweden. I know I
>can't spell very well but at least I try and succeed many times (unless
>dumbasses like you add a "nice" post)

>Sorry just a bit frustrated.

>Cheers,

>Mikael Laine / MCSE
>System Engineer

And you want to bust him. Give me a break. Why didn't you post that after
Wizaro. Not everyone speaks good english, and if we are going to bust people
when they try. why don't you go and try playing a game based in France and
see how good your French is
